list.0: Within every governorate, there is one or more courts of appeal.
list.1: The Court of Appeal consists of 3 judges: a president and two consultants.
list.2: The public prosecution is represented before the Court of Appeal by the Appellate Public Prosecutor or an Attorney General.

ideas.0: The Court of Appeal considers the appeal of all judgments issued by the Criminal Single Judge in the cases of misdemeanors, provided that they shall have been settled in the merits of the dispute.However, if they were not settled in the merits of the dispute, they shall be appealed with the nal judgment only.
ideas.1: The appeal of decisions that settle one or more of the formal defenses stipulated in Article 73 of the Criminal Procedures Code shall be accepted.
ideas.2: Decisions by which the Single Judge terminates the lawsuit without addressing its subject matter.
ideas.3: Decisions issued on accepting or revoking the release requests.

pin: The Court of Appeal is entitled, when exercising its tasks, to listen to witnesses, interrogate the parties of the lawsuit, invite new witnesses, appoint an expert, listen to experts and carry out any new investigations it deems appropriate...
